body_html: @xiejw FYI -- I think this makes sense: the gpu options set in TF_CONFIG should be used. If one wants to vary them by worker/PS, once can send different TF_CONFIG (though that would only rarely be necessary). Passing GPU options to non-GPU workers should be harmless.
body_text: @xiejw FYI -- I think this makes sense: the gpu options set in TF_CONFIG should be used. If one wants to vary them by worker/PS, once can send different TF_CONFIG (though that would only rarely be necessary). Passing GPU options to non-GPU workers should be harmless.
body: @xiejw FYI -- I think this makes sense: the gpu options set in TF_CONFIG should be used. If one wants to vary them by worker/PS, once can send different TF_CONFIG (though that would only rarely be necessary). Passing GPU options to non-GPU workers should be harmless.
